definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: We are to try for peace. This does not mean pacifism .
sentences.chinese: 我們要努力謀求和平，但不代表和平主義。

sentences.english: They were all virulently pacifistic and anti-nationalistic.
sentences.chinese: 他們堅持極度的和平主義和反國家主義。

sentences.english: Christian Pacifism is the most concentrated expression of Kagawa's thought.
sentences.chinese: 基督教和平主義思想是賀川思想的最爲集中的體現。

sentences.english: Many japanese cannot tolerate that pacificism .
sentences.chinese: 很多日本人沒辦法忍受和平主義。

sentences.english: He later cast aside his pacifism.
sentences.chinese: 後來，他放棄了和平主義立場。
